title: ATTENTION RIOT: Please Help Me!
body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/sdmyTow8-perma-banned-for-suspicious-activity-and-cant-log-into-support-or-forum-pages
^^^^
My problem has gone unanswered for a while. I keep feel like I keep going around in circles with the support team, they are nice and helpful for sure, but I am not getting anything and it's just circles we are going in. 
So once again, I am using my sons account (this one) with my son sitting next to me to type this as I can't access anything related to league of legends. I am completely locked out.
They said to me that they are having trouble verifying that I own the account. I gave them heaps of information they wanted, plus I suggested I could give a whole heap of other info, such as messages I have sent in game that I remember, friends on my list, skins and champs on the account, champs I play most, and heaps more. The reply was that there was "discrepancies" in the information I gave them required for recovery. They need to prove I own it and they said it looks like I am a "secondary user of the account" 
I know for sure I am the only one to play on the account and am willing to do anything to prove it because I am extremely confident I am not a "secondary user" especially with the amount of actual money I've spent on the game. 

I am very stuck and I want my account back, after all, it's just a game and they are kind of treating it like I want to get into fort knox and find the original recipe and the secret herbs and spices haha].

But I know for sure I made the account and am not a second user, as true as I  swear on it as true as i am sitting here typing this (and an aussie wouldn't misuse that saying!)

So I really need help. Please someone.
My forums post is at the top of this message, the link up there^

Thanks in advance. Please help :(

replies.body: Email confirmation should solve it all, if you've done that; i don't know what else.

Hi,
I have reset my passwords to my email, and it worked. I log in to everything related to league and it says wrong password.
I login to the league client and its says im banned.
The support team said that she found evidence I am a secondary user and that there where decrepancies in the info about my account I gave her.

Ask support how to prove you are the owner.

Support is infamous for being dicks sometimes.

Hi, 
I have had negative experences with them too in the past. I suggested heaps of alternate info I stated in my OP, also gave all the info they asked for. 

She said there where "discrepancies" in the info i provided and they have evidance hat I am a secondary user (which I know and swear on my life I am not a secondary user of the account. I have no idea how they gathered that? 

I am in between a rock and a hard place:( i replied 3 days ago but no response. I bumped the ticket and asked submitted further info and asked that i can do to prove I own it. Because I genuinely know I am not a second user of my account.

^^ i know I am not in the wrong and am not a secondary player. I feel as if They are avoiding me now knowing that they are wrong and have banned me for a reson that dosnt exist. 
:(
